content: उपरोधः {@--1@} Obstruction, impediment, obstacle; शरत्प्रमृष्टांबुधरोपरोधः <ls>R. 6. 44</ls>; <ls>Śi. 20. 74</ls>; सकौतुक° विनयं <ls>U. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Disturbance, trouble, molestation; तपोवननिवासिनामुपरोधो मा भूत् <ls>Ś. 1</ls>, <ls n="Ś.">5</ls>, <ls n="Ś.">6</ls>; अनुग्रहः खल्वेष नोपरोधः <ls>V. 3</ls>; उपरोधः सह्यतां {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%}; detention; किं राजर्षेरुपरोधेन <ls>Ś. 3.</ls> {@--3@} Opposition, refusal, check, restraint. {@--4@} Covering, surrounding, blocking up. {@--5@} Binding, tying, seizing. {@--6@} Protection, favour.
